name: back
trans: in, at, or toward a previous place or condition or an earlier time

name: file
trans: to store papers, letters, or other documents in an ordered or particular way

name: clamp
trans: to use a device to hold something tightly

name: current
trans: a flow of electricity

name: inventor
trans: someone who designs or creates something that did not exist before

name: inspiration
trans: someone or something that gives you ideas for doing something

name: derive
trans: to get or obtain something

name: refinement
trans: the process of improving something

name: unveil
trans: to make something secret known

name: critical
trans: of the greatest importance

name: ruling
trans: an official decision

name: device
trans: an object or machine that has been invented to fulfill a particular purpose

name: patent
trans: the legal right to be the only one who can make, use, or sell an invention for a particular number of years

name: specifically
trans: clearly, exactly, or in detail

name: entrepreneur
trans: a person who attempts to make a profit by starting a company or by operating alone in the business world, esp. when it involves taking risks

name: investor
trans: a person or group of people that puts its money into a business or other organization in order to make a profit

name: ransack
trans: to completely search a place in a way that causes mess and damage

name: suitable
trans: being right or correct for a particular situation or person

name: infringement
trans: an action that breaks a rule, law, etc.

name: invalid
trans: not true or acceptable, or not correctly thought out
